C24_CVAD-715_Broker_v1.00

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


C24_CVAD-715_Broker_v1.00

Overview

Monitoring template for Delivery Controller included in CVAD (Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops) ver 7.15.

Installation details

  1. Prior to template import - create host group called C24 - XD 7.15 Broker
  2. After import - update template macro section with correct host names.

For more information about template configuration setings and template hiistory please visit citrix24 blog

Author

citrix24

Macros used

|Name|Description|Default|Type| |—-|———–|——-|—-| |{$CTX_LIC_SRV}|<p>-</p>|add your host name|Text macro| |{$DB_SRV}|<p>-</p>|add your host name|Text macro|

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.

There are no triggers in this template.

C24_CVAD-715_Broker_v1.00

Overview

Monitoring template for Delivery Controller included in CVAD (Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops) ver 7.15.

Installation details

  1. Prior to template import - create host group called C24 - XD 7.15 Broker
  2. After import - update template macro section with correct host names.

For more information about template configuration setings and template hiistory please visit citrix24 blog

Author

citrix24

There are no template links in this template.

There are no discovery rules in this template.
